EmailTemplate.description: Email template to use for direct inquiries to WEX that are predominantly a small-business opportunity (for which WEX does not have a great solution).
EmailTemplate.name: Small Biz Direct Inquiry Response
EmailTemplate.subject: re: Your Recent Wright Express Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Applicant,
Thank you for your interest in the Wright Express MasterCard® program for Small Business. Unfortunately, the program is no longer available. We apologize for any inconvenience to you.
Wright Express is an industry leader in providing payment solutions for small businesses that have company vehicles. The Wright Express Universal Fleet Card program may be a great fit for your fuel and vehicle related service needs. The Wright Express Universal Fleet Card is accepted at 90% of retail fueling locations nationwide, and over 45,000 name-brand service sites, such as Jiffy Lube, Sears and more.
With the Wright Express Universal Fleet Card you can set pre-determined limits on what drivers can charge, how often and on what kinds of products and services, during what period of time. Gain ultimate control over vehicle related spending.
The program’s powerful reporting functions also help you slash the administrative time and expense involved in tracking and managing vehicle related spending.
If this program is of interest to you, please contact us toll-free at 1-888-300-9039. We would be happy to explain more about our services and how we can help you save time and money with regard to your vehicle operating costs.
Sincerely,
Justine Libby Manager, Inside Sales Wright Express Financial Services Corporation
